name: @ourwork/object-utils
description: A set of js object utils

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run lint && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run lint && npm run mocha -- --watch
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=text-summary --reporter=lcov --reporter=cobertura --report-dir=./coverage --reporter=html npm run mocha --reporter=min
scripts.update:docs: npm run docs && git add docs/. && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m 'Updating `docs`'

author: hallais

hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run update:docs
